Text: This is a great idea but it's hard for me to believe it's legit. This should be up on a website rather than on TBP
And why should it be on a site rather than TPB?

Mostly because it requires a torrent client to download. It's stupid having to download Vuze just so I can download a uTorrent repack. Also, there is very little information here about what this repack does. It just seems sketchy and my first instinct tells me that it's probably malware. Having a website up with some information would help cull that instinct. You have a brilliant idea here it just needs some work.

Then why not test it under sandboxie with "Buster Sandbox Analyzer"... It will tell every action that the program does. You have a good point where you need some client to download the repack, but I don't have the resources for a website :/
